charges.charge_description: Transfer of Jurisdiction - COUNT 1: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - a quantity in excess of 1 kilogram of heroin, a schedule I controlled substance; PENALTY: 10 yrs to life and/or $4 million; $100 CVF; 5 yrs of TSR. COUNT 2: Poss w/int to distr approx 4.70 kilograms of heroin; PENALTY: 10 yrs to life and/or $4 million; $100 CVF; 5 yrs TSR.

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced in the Southern District of Texas, Laredo Division: COUNT 1 - DISMISSED ON GVT'S ORAL MOTION. COUNT 2 - 156 months imprs; 5 yrs TSR; all usual terms apply; waived fine; drug aftercare; 150 hours of community service within 15 months; $100 CVF; advised of right to appeal; Court recommends facility near Dallas, Tx;

charges.charge_offence_description: Transfer of Jurisdiction - COUNT 1: CONSPIRACY TO
